description:
So I am still trying to keep things interesting, exploring different themes, without dipping in to "acting" or plots that I think are, well, kind of boring.
I discovered a public yet private restroom, complete with a glory hole. I figured I could get a way with actually filming there. I knew lighting would be an issue and I just couldn't wait around for guys to show up to film, so I of course had to make it happen by getting my models in there. I felt like I could try take the glory hole theme and make it a bit different from all the others, yet control it, but still make it authentic.
I like the glory hole theme. I still have straight guys that only want to get a blow job, and I figured this would be a great way for them to explore guy-on-guy sex. Both the Edge and Serviced series allow them to perform, and hopefully this will be another outlet to get these guys off.
This is the first in what I hope will be a series. I'm gonna try to keep pushing the filming on it, and I clearly have a bit to learn.
BUT, this was an incredibly easy video to film. Tyler was surprisingly turned on by the whole thing, and it was one of those videos that I basically sat back and watched it all unfold.
And if you like a little lite piss action, this video has a "wee" bit of that. ;-)
Enjoy,
title: Adam & Tyler Thomas - G:hOle Oral
